title: Alien by Ridley Scott
content:
Could somebody help me idetifying the typeface used during the conversations with Mother (their computer) during the first Alien film by Ridley Scott? I have to do a presentation about it and the closed I got was City BQ by Berthold horizontally distorted.

thx
